description: [RedLeaves](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0153) can communicate to its C2 over TCP using a custom binary protocol.(Citation: FireEye APT10 April 2017)

external_references.description: FireEye iSIGHT Intelligence. (2017, April 6). APT10 (MenuPass Group): New Tools, Global Campaign Latest Manifestation of Longstanding Threat. Retrieved June 29, 2017.
